sentences: Tema elusid on põnevad ja rikkalikud.
Minu kallim külastas palju erinevaid elusid.
Ta õnnitab enda elusid kogu aeg.
context: In Estonian, 'elusid' is the plural form of 'elu', meaning lives or life experiences. It can refer to the existence or life story of individuals as well as multiple instances of living beings. The word is commonly used in contexts discussing personal histories and experiences.
